reviews.review_msg: Jorge is clearly passionate and very knowledgeable about French Literature.  He speaks clearly, and he is usually good humoured.  He has high expectations for papers, however, and is somewhat of a hard marker.  Two papers make 90% of your mark, so it is necessary to work very hard on them, and follow his format very closely - or else!!
Very stuffy, sticks to his opinion of the texts and his opinion only.
Brings very interesting topics to class. Sometimes hesitant to open these topics up for discussion though.

Such a bad teacher. His French wasn't good and he made elementary mistakes.  I could see why people would like him if they're looking for an easy ride, but if you're looking at being educated, wait until a different prof teaches the class.
